medical_history.chief_complaint: Worsening left lower quadrant abdominal pain associated with vomiting.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms worsened over the past few days, with vomiting occurring for 1 day. The patient also reported constipation and decreased flatus over several days. Decrease in shortness of breath has been noted, with patient stating he can walk only approximately ___ yards before being limited by SOB.
medical_history.past_medical_history: CAD s/p stent, HTN, HLD, diverticulosis, perforated appendicitis s/p appendectomy, duodenal stricture.
medical_history.family_history: Son died of brain cancer, father died of lung cancer, mother died of old age.
